means: 使用不当的名字或名称

sentence.Network_en: Herbal "tea" is something of a misnomer because these drinks contain no tea at all.
sentence.Network_cn: 花草“茶”是一个误称，因为这类饮料里面根本不含茶。

sentence.Network_en: Herbal 'tea' is something of a misnomer because these drinks contain no tea at all.
sentence.Network_cn: 花草“茶”是一个误称，因为这类饮料里面根本不含茶。

sentence.Network_en: Actually, " Underground " is a misnomer, because more than half the shops are above ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上, “ 地下 ” 这个名称用之不当, 因为半数以上的店铺是在地面上的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(M)--石油百科 ... mismeasurement 测量不准 misnomer 误称 misoperation 操作失误.
SAT官方指南OG阅读真题10套 - 豆丁网 ... gaudy adj. 华而不实的 misnomer n. 用词不当 hybrid n. 混合物.
mismatching(1) 失配(2)失谐(3)不重合misnomer 误称，用字错误misorientation 取向错误
...称古希腊类似今天所说的小说文类，都有时代错误以及误名(misnomer)之嫌，(45)西方古典文论者拉塞尔(D.A.Russel)就曾说，如 …

list.abs: To call it a hotel is a misnomer -- it was more like a prison !, 称它作旅馆是用词不当它更象一座监狱!
the simple answer : user-friendly is a misnomer , and one that makes a complex situation seem simple .简单的回答是：“界面友好”是个误解，令使用困难的也可能是简单界面。
PacePace can actually a bit a misnomer so be careful ., 速度速度实际上有点用词不当所以要当心.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French, from the Old French verb mesnommer, from mes- 'wrongly' + nommer 'to name' (based on Latin nomen 'name')

entry.tran: 用词不当;使用不当的名称;误称
entry.def: If you say that a word or name is a misnomer, you mean that it describes something incorrectly.

example.ex: Herbal 'tea' is something of a misnomer because these drinks contain no tea at all.
example.tran: 花草“茶”是一个误称，因为这类饮料里面根本不含茶。

auth_sentence.content: Intelligence thus elucidated can always be called a misnomer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Intelligence thus elucidated can always be called a misnomer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Intelligence thus elucidated can always be called a misnomer.

auth_sentence.content: The term "greenhouse effect" is a misnomer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The term "greenhouse effect" is a misnomer.
